column4: So.. no one has any info on a similarly-looking netbook-launcher for Precise 12.04 ? I really miss it
I've not seen any notices on a return of it.
I'm sure it won't "come back", since canonical is promoting Unity. But is there a known port of it? or an alternative? Maybe a PPA?
Ubuntu has different OS in the works I believe I was just looking around I see nothing yet.
